title: Animal friends
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Roll-call in the Rockies: In Banff National Park census takers on horseback count animals. Zoo Comes to Class: Animals from Stanley Park Zoo visit an elementary school in Vancouver. It’s A Dog’s Life: The S.P.C.A. in Montreal performs good deeds for people’s pets.
